attributes.action: Keep the current passport with the presence of the Queen.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In light of the recent proposal to change the message on the UK passport to an extract from the EU constitution, we the undersigned want to keep the current message in any future passports and not have part of a constitution which was partly rejected by EU countries instead.

In Summary: Keep the Passports as they are.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Keep the current passport with the presence of the Queen."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page18050


Prime Minister's Office
